description: The butterfly bush (Buddleja davidii 'White Ball') is a magnificent shrub with many desirable features! Its eye-catching blooms are hosted by an abundance of snow-white crowns, making it an attractive asset to any garden. In the summer, its fragrant posy produces a pleasant scent that is loved by butterflies and bees. Not only is it beautiful and aromatic, but its also resistant to most pests and diseases and it is easy to maintain with simple pruning. Its vigor and resilience make it an easy choice for any garden.
